# systemDomainMask

**Type Property**

A directory for system files provided by Apple (`/System`) .

## Declaration

```swift
static var systemDomainMask: FileManager.SearchPathDomainMask { get }
```

## Discussion

This directory can’t be modified.

## Specifying Search Path Domains

- **userDomainMask**: The user’s home directory—the place to install user’s personal items (`~`).
- **localDomainMask**: The place to install items available to everyone on this machine.
- **networkDomainMask**: The place to install items available on the network (`/Network`).
- **allDomainsMask**: All domains.
